column1: Great oil filled radiator. It takes a little time - like *all* oil-filled radiators - to heat up; but the warmth from this is more comforting than the dry heat coming out of the blower-type heaters
column2: and the stinging heat from the halogen and other infrared heaters. Oil radiators heat up the entire room
column3: but take a little time.This unit does not have any blower - so no dry heat. Very comfortable.

column1: the product is simple and easy to install and use with the packaging it came in is also good all thanks to flipkart. great job thankyou
First time using this product after a recommendation from my friend. I love the product but the way the buttons are made
Was broken and looked like it was used. And also not effective and very bulky.
Product is good. ..works well but little underfinished...
Heating is not up to the mark. Better go for Bajaj..that's even 1K cheaper than this.
I usually plan to buy things in FK since they have sellers that deliver to my hometown. But price here is always more :(
This is a good room heater
column2: but it will not instantly heat your room
column3: you need to keep it on for whole day/night to maintain a nice temperature
column5: no such electrical faults or issues came after using it for 10 days for long time.
